direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate the presence of parameters in a JSONObject but with different requirements (one vs. at least one).
Both methods involve parameter validation with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods handle missing parameters and throw similar exceptions.
Both methods process and validate parameters, though they handle different types of data.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a JSONObject to be initialized before validation.
This method should be invoked before checkOnlyOneOfParameters to ensure at least one parameter is present.
Both methods verify parameter presence and handle similar exceptions, making it useful for assertions.
